topics.author: 509129db7f123b36cb010fa5

topics.body:
"@boz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53168108636872508e7a0000#post_53168108636872508e7a0000
Not really.

Inflation is a good thing for the usa anyhow.  What we always do whenever it's war time is drive up our deficit, then drive up our inflation so that our deficit loses it's value and we cheat the system.  Also the whole thing with the shutdown was a bunch of whinny politicians upset they didn't get their way.  Chances are there won't be another shutdown, cause turns out it massively fucks up your approval rating and is bad for politicians to do when it's close to election year.  That's why congress approved a budget already cause it's a election year.


What is probably going to happen towards the usa in the long run is that for the next two years they'll work on reducing the annual deficit bit by bit so no one freaks out then when hillary becomes president(pretty much a given she's going to win no matter what) they'll do something to bring in further revenue and then work on the deficit.


Right now though a balanced budget or actually paying off our deficit would be a very bad thing economically.

topics.body:
So I just blew the last few hours on Diablo III. It seems that they've finally patched the game enough that it is really good, as opposed to just kinda good. Loot no longer sucks, what with the auction houses closing down, and in general everything feels a lot smoother.

Now my only real complaint about the game is that they're sticking with the always online requirement, you know, because it is just fucking fantastic that to play the game alone I have to wait for them to finish maintenance on the goddamn servers.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
LoL
Putin's plan keeps fucking up.  There's already 15 billion raised on top of the one billion the usa is sending to help ukraine's economy.  At this rate by the end of next week they'll already have raised the 32 billion total to prevent any economic downfall in ukraine from splitting with russia.

Putin's got nothing to gamble with.  He has no chips left and is gambling with the shirt on his back at this point.

On the plus side this is probably going to end by the end of next week considering how much they're raising money for ukraine, cause once that happens putin will have nothing left to gamble with, not even the shirt on his back.

Tl:dr; Don't try to cheat with uno cards in poker.

topics.body:
Well during the downtime I actually had a fairly good idea.  Pseudo anime.  No not sudo as in linux programming.  No not when 14 year old weabos try to draw anime.  What I mean is take RWBY's art style; now remove the internal shading and give it a thicker external colored cell shading to act as a outline.  You now have a 3d model that looks 2d.






Also I finally watched Rise of the Guardians and I had a fucking creepy thought.  If jack frost can only be seen by people who believe in him that would be the most twisted metaphorical death ever in the long run.  Imagine in the movie if people stopped all together believing in him across the board.  "I have no mouth and I must scream"
